New Records: Virat Kohli broke Sachin Tendulkar's record for the most runs at a World Cup with a game to spare
Pre-Game Insights: India are 10 wins from 10 so far at the World Cup, but the pressure of the occasion is a big obstacle for them
The key battle will come at the top of the order, with Mitchell Starc and Josh Hazlewood trying to stop Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill and Virat Kohli getting off to a flyer
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's dominance has been such that they have not really been significantly tested at any stage in the tournament
India's attack has everything, with players like Mohammed Shami who is the top wicket taker at the tournament
Others: The match will be broadcast live in the UK on Sky Sports Main Event and Sky Sports Cricket
The game will start at 8:30am GMT and will take place at Ahmedabad's Narendra Modi Stadium
